duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct patient care, assess and monitor patient condition, administer medications, and coordinate with healthcare team.
Perform wound care, provide education to patients and families, and assist in discharge planning.
Work in a critical care setting, handle emergencies, and provide support to patients in distress.
Exercise clinical judgment, prioritize patient needs, and collaborate with interdisciplinary teams for patient care.
Utilize electronic medical records (EMR) for documentation and ensure accurate record-keeping.
Demonstrate compassion, empathy, and professionalism in all patient interactions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) degree (Master's degree in Nursing preferred)
